scripts.doc: rm -rf ./public/doc && mkdir -p ./public/doc && apidoc -i ./app/controllers/ -o ./public/doc/ && mkdir -p ./public/doc/swagger && cp -r ./node_modules/swagger-ui-dist/* ./public/doc/swagger/ && apidoc-swagger -i ./app/controllers/ -o ./public/doc/swagger/ && sed -i 's/https:\/\/petstore.swagger.io\/v2\///g' ./public/doc/swagger/index.html
